diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $DEA$ is $45$ degrees.
The length of the line $AG$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $AE$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $GD$ is $y$ units.
The measure of angle $ADE$ is $30$ degrees.
The point $G$ lies on the line $DE$.
The line $GA$ is perpendicular to the line $GD$.
line_instances: The lines $GD$ and $GA$ intersect at point $G$.
The lines $GD$ and $DE$ intersect at point $D$.
The lines $GA$ and $AD$ intersect at point $A$.
